metadata.title: CVE-2015-7555 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in giffix.c in giffix in giflib 5.1.1 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (program crash) via crafted imageand logical screen width fields in a GIF file.

criterions.comment: giflib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
